column4: i have a question, once the packages are done downloading, how do i install them or are they automatically installed on the system?
If you went through the usual updating procedure, and there weren't any problems, then the downloaded packages should have replaced the old ones and installed

You should only have to reboot if something significant was upgraded, like the version of the kernel that you're using :> Everything else can be stopped and started in one way or another without rebooting...but you can do it either way really
